com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api

Class CreditCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api.CreditCard

  • public class CreditCard
extends java.lang.Object
    A creditcard for making creditcard purchases.
    Since:
    JSE5

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreditCard

        public CreditCard(long creditCardNumber,
          short expiryDate)
        Creates a creditcard with keyed-in creditcard number and expiryDate.
        Parameters:
        creditCardNumber - the keyed creditcard number
        expiryDate - the keyed expiry date

      • CreditCard

        public CreditCard(long creditCardNumber,
          short expiryDate,
          java.lang.String cvv2,
          java.lang.String street,
          java.lang.String zip)
        Creates a creditcard with keyed-in creditcard number and expiryDate. Additional cvv2 and avs verification info are optional.
        Parameters:
        creditCardNumber - the keyed creditcard number
        expiryDate - the keyed expiry date
        cvv2 - the cvv2 on the creditcard
        street - the street of the creditcard holder
        zip - the zip of the creditcard holder

      • CreditCard

        public CreditCard(java.lang.String magneticData)
        Creates a creditcard with swiped magneticData.
        Parameters:
        magneticData - the magnetic data on the creditcard

      • CreditCard

        public CreditCard(java.lang.String magneticData,
          java.lang.String cvv2,
          java.lang.String street,
          java.lang.String zip)
        Creates a creditcard with swiped magneticData. Additional cvv2 and avs verification info are optional.
        Parameters:
        magneticData - the magnetic data on the creditcard. Not null.
        cvv2 - the cvv2 on the creditcard
        street - the street of the creditcard holder
        zip - the zip of the creditcard holder
